title: Surface gallium oxide hydroxide species adsorbing carbon dioxide to enhance the photocatalytic activity of silver-loaded calcium titanate for carbon dioxide reduction with water
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article

GaOOH as a good CO2 adsorber works together with Ag NPs to improve photocatalytic CO2 reduction by a CaTiO3 photocatalyst.
